scripts.analyze:cjs: rimraf dist && cross-env ANALYZE=true ENTRY_FILE=./src/index.cjs webpack
scripts.analyze:cjs-fix: rimraf dist && cross-env ANALYZE=true ENTRY_FILE=./src/index-fix.cjs webpack
scripts.analyze:esm: rimraf dist && cross-env ANALYZE=true ENTRY_FILE=./src/index.mjs webpack
scripts.analyze:esm-fix: rimraf dist && cross-env ANALYZE=true ENTRY_FILE=./src/index-fix.mjs webpack
